alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 11:44AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL BAY COUNTY THROUGH 1230 PM EDT... At 1144 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Tyndall Air Force Base, or 11 miles south of Panama City, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Bahama Beach, Biltmore Beach, Sunnyside, Millville, Vicksburg, and West Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
